Player History
Drafted in 5th round, 86th overall pick, by Los Angeles in 1970...
Injured on 5/3/1971 with a Strained Rib Cage Muscle, out for 1-2 weeks...
Had first career hit on 4/5/1973, off Greg Garrett (PIT)...
Had 5 hits with 4 RBI against San Francisco on 7/20/1978...
Won Player of the Week award on 7/21/1978, hitting .571 with 0 HR, 4 RBI...
Signed as a free agent by New York (N) on 3/1/1980 to a minor league contract.
Injured on 6/12/1982 with a Inflamed Calf Muscle, out for 2 weeks...
Injured on 8/2/1984 with a Bruised Finger, out for 5 days...
Injured on 8/17/1984 with a Bruised Hand, out for 4 days...
Released by New York (N) on 3/2/1985...
Drafted in 3rd round, 47th overall pick, by California in 1987...
Injured on 4/27/1990 with a Pulled Tricep Muscle, out for 2 weeks...
Earned first career win on 7/18/1998...
Won World Series with Anaheim in 1998...
